segments.text: The sink is a total mess with water gushing out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's flooding the floor and ruining the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman just stands there, drying her plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the slop, and she doesn't flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are making it worse, climbing everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is filthy from the wet floor, I bet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's hand in the cookie jarâ€”hope he washes up later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching too, probably getting crumbs all over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked up, waiting in the damp air.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window's open, but it can't air out this disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden looks clean compared to this slovenly interior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such neglect in a kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything's going to smell musty from the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene turns my stomach.
segments.speaker: PAR
